name: Escape the dungeon (Rafabinda)
description:
It's my second game, i've made it for my five years old daughter.

It's a labyrinth game, you have to find the key, then the exit. There are bonuses : a cup a coffe  to increase speed and a map to use by pressing "enter", but beware, if you release it, the map disappears !

There are 6 levels.

Have fun !
